sentences.en: Animal change cent is change of change of pigskin, cowhide, horse leather, sheepskin to wait.
sentences.cn: 动物革分为猪皮革 、 牛皮革 、 马皮革 、 羊皮革等.

sentences.en: During the last outdoor exploration, we rowed a sheepskin raft across the river, it was exciting.
sentences.cn: 上次户外探险, 我们用羊皮筏过河, 好刺激呢.

sentences.en: Her sleeveless jacket is made of soft sheepskin and is very warm.
sentences.cn: 她这个坎肩是软羊皮的,特别暖和.

sentences.en: If he dropped into water, he had a new wadded pants, and one sheepskin coat.
sentences.cn: 要是他掉进水里, 他还有新棉裤, 还有老羊皮袄.

sentences.en: Luxurious sheepskin wicks away moisture, keeping your foot dry and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 豪华羊皮灯芯了水分, 你的脚保持干燥,舒适.

sentences.en: Many people think, gold lacquer sheepskin is more expensive than common sheepskin, actually otherwise.
sentences.cn: 不少人认为, 金漆羊皮比普通羊皮贵, 实则不然.

sentences.en: North wind is blown thorough sheepskin jacket.
Our Tall Venice Boots are manufactured from premium grade sheepskin pelts.
sentences.cn: 我们的高的威尼斯靴子被由高级的等级毛皮制造成.

sentences.en: Sheath with soft leather, sheepskin - poke pressure sewing.
sentences.cn: 软鞘用牛皮 、 羊皮模戳压缝制.

sentences.en: Sheepskin - like soft texture, we enjoy the infinite charm from tactile senses.
sentences.cn: 羊皮般的柔软质感, 享受触觉感官的无限魅力.

sentences.en: The company mainly produces operating cowhide, sheepskin , pigskin leather, and so true.
sentences.cn: 公司主要生产经营牛皮 、 羊皮 、 猪皮等真皮革.

sentences.en: The dying techniques of double - face sheepskin were introduced in detail.
sentences.cn: 着重介绍了 双面 绵羊革的几种染色方法.

sentences.en: The sheepskin cape is the cream of traditional clothing culture of Naxi nationality.
sentences.cn: 纳西族女性羊皮披肩是纳西族传统服饰中的精华.

sentences.en: Tufts of wool hang from his shaggy sheepskin like a mangy dog.
sentences.cn: 他那件穿破的皮袄上有一绺绺羊毛挂下来,象是一条脱毛的狗.

sentences.en: You left those villagers grasping floats made from inflated oiled sheepskin bags behind you.
sentences.cn: 你把那个抱着吹足气的羊皮油口袋的老乡甩在后面.

words.tran_cn: 羊皮；羊皮纸；羊皮革；毕业证书

trans.tran_en: Sheepskin is the skin of a sheep with the wool still attached to it, used especially for making coats and rugs
